sect1.title: Scale/Colour Relations by Numerical Value
sect1.para: The Scale/Colour Relations by Numerical Value Annotator allows users to view the importance of a relation based on a specified attribute's numerical values. Users can select the minimum and maximum sizes for the width of relations to scale up/down. They can also specify colours for the relations' colouring or use the rainbow scale (red = high, purple = low) by ticking a check-box. They can pick a colour for relations which do not carry any information about the selected attribute.
